name: Great storm and tempest
description: A great storm arose that was unprecedented in the land, accompanied by a terrible tempest, thunder, lightnings, and a significant earthquake which caused great destruction in the cities and land, including the burning of the city of Zarahemla and the sinking of the city of Moroni into the sea.

location.name: City of Zarahemla
location.description: The city was set on fire during the storm.
